content: The Song of Deborah and Barak
Then Deborah and Barak the son of Abinoam sang on that day, saying,
Hear, you kings; listen, you dignitaries!
I myself—to the , I myself will sing,
I will sing praise to the , the God of Israel!
, when You went out from Seir,
When You marched from the field of Edom,
The earth quaked, the heavens also dripped,
The mountains flowed  at the presence of the ,
This Sinai, at the presence of the , the God of Israel.
And the land was at rest for forty years.
